title: Generate clear resin headstone mold image with flowers, grass, and Yorkie portrait for Ponce

requirements.text: Generate a new headstone mold product image showing a clear resin headstone shape with flowers and green grass elements embedded inside, and a male Yorkie dog portrait displayed inside a black square frame centered on the headstone. This image should replace or be used as the Headstone shape showcase image in ShapeShowcases.tsx.

quotes: make a clear resin headstone mold with flowers, grass, and a picture of a male yorkie inside a black square frame to put for Ponce headstone picture

acceptanceCriteria: The headstone mold image depicts a clear/transparent resin headstone shape
Flowers and green grass are visibly embedded within the resin
A male Yorkie dog portrait is centered on the headstone inside a solid black square frame
The image is used in the Headstone card within ShapeShowcases.tsx

requirements.text: Update the Headstone shape card in ShapeShowcases.tsx to render the newly generated clear resin headstone mold image (ponce-headstone-mold.dim_800x900.png) as its showcase photo.

quotes: to put for Ponce headstone picture

acceptanceCriteria: The Headstone card in ShapeShowcases.tsx displays the new ponce-headstone-mold image
No other shape cards are affected

constraints: Do not modify any immutable frontend paths (hooks, main.tsx, ui components)
Only the Headstone shape card image should be updated in ShapeShowcases.tsx
nonGoals: Changing backend data models or order logic
Modifying any other shape showcase cards (Square, Heart, Hexagon)

required: Clear transparent resin headstone mold shape with colorful flowers (roses, daisies) and green grass blades embedded inside the resin, centered with a male Yorkshire Terrier (Yorkie) dog portrait inside a solid black square frame on the face of the headstone, photorealistic resin craft style (ponce-headstone-mold.dim_800x900.png)
